title: Portable Linked Profile
synopsis: Tired of registering on dozens of different web services having to type the same information repeatedly?

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to a [[Federated Wiki]] site for the [[C0de Academy]], where we write about code and programming.

title: World Citizenship
synopsis: The aim here is to create a flexible decentralised identity which combine elements of [[Blockchain ID]], [[WebID]] and [[Portable Linked Profile]]s.
